Description: String of glazed composition beads; various colours and forms including grapes and daisies.
Curator's comments: Published: Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt (Japan 1999-2000): No 32
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1990 20 Oct-9 Dec, Japan, Tokyo, Setagaya Art Museum, Treasures of the British Museum, cat. no.76 1991 5 Jan-20 Feb, Japan, Yamaguchi, Prefectural Museum of Art, Treasures of the British Museum, cat. no.76 1991 9 Mar-7 May, Japan, Osaka, National Museum of Art, Treasures of the British Museum, cat. no.76 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed
